statements: UPDATE AppData SET username='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE AppData SET phone_number='+1-123-456-7890', last_sync='2022-01-01' WHERE username = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE AppData SET username = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE AppData SET phone_number = '+1234567890', last_sync = '2022-01-01', data = 'Some updated data' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE offline_data SET data = '{"name": "John Doe"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE mobile_apps SET app_version = 2.5, app_name = 'App XYZ' WHERE app_id = 'xyz123';
UPDATE offline_data SET data = '{"name": "John Doe", "age": 30}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE mobile_apps SET app_version = 2.5, app_name = 'My New App' WHERE app_id = 'app001';
UPDATE offline_data SET data = 'Updated data', timestamp = '2022-02-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE mobile_users SET username = 'New Username', user_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE offline_data SET timestamp = NOW(), data = 'New data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE app_settings SET setting_name = 'New Setting', setting_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE app_name = 'MyApp';
UPDATE OfflineUserData SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE SyncHistory SET last_sync = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE OfflineUserData SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123456789' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE AppSettings SET setting_value='updated value' WHERE app_id=2;
UPDATE offline_data SET data = 'Updated offline data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE app_users SET password = 'newpassword' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE offline_data SET data = 'Updated data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE app_users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = 3;
